title: Education verification with DID
description:
Fresh grads find it hard to share & track physical edu certificates.

Employers find it is too costly to verify one's edu certificates.
solution: We believe that implementing Atala PRISM DID among uni/colleges, helps fresh grads and future employers to verify education certificates.
experience: 2+ years working with credit rating agency with some research done on this topic. A UX designer/researcher with 10+ years working experience
